songs.title: Overjoyed (Yeasayer Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(Night)
(Night)
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
(Night)
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, Night, oh, ah)
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)

[Verse 1]
Oh I feel overjoyed
When you listen to my words
I see them sinking in
Oh I see them crawling underneath your skin

[Chorus 1]
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night

[Verse 2]
You lean towards despair
Any given opportunity you're there (Opportunity you're there)
But what is there to gain (Gain)
When you're always falling off the fence that way (That way)
(Night, night)

[Chorus 2]
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night

[Chorus 3]
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
And I hear you calling in the dead of night
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh, ah)
Oh I hear you calling in the dead of night
